name: RobotCombatEvents
0:
”Alexa, ask Robot Combat Events when is the next event”
”Alexa, ask Robot Combat Events when is the next antweight event”
”Alexa, ask Robot Combat Events what are the events in July”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robot combat events
des:
Search for robot combat events all over the world. First, set your country where you want to look for events. Then search for events. You can search based on weightclass, and you can filter the events by month.

Alexa, open Robot Combat Events.
What is my country set to?
Set my country to Canada.
When is the next event?
What is the next event in June?
When are the events in January?
What are the heavyweight events for March?
What is the next event for weight class sportsman in October?
Where is the next event in July for weight class fairyweight?
What are the events in September for featherweights?
Where are events for beetleweights in July?
When is the next antweight event in August?
What is the next event for weight class hobbyweight?

You can also navigate through the list of events using "next," "repeat," and "start over."


Icon made using icons by Freepik.com from www.flaticon.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
